data.Name: Huan Zhang
data.staff_bio:
Huan Zhang is the webmaster for the Northeast Regional Center for Vision Education at ICI/UMass Boston. He has maintained listservs; built websites with CSS, MySQL, and PHP; and provided design, quality assurance, and accessibility consultation for several web-based projects at ICI.

Huan entered the technology field in 1996. He has worked for many companies, including WGBH, Fidelity Investments, Channel Wave Software Inc., and Lionbridge Inc. He has taught web animation and graphic design classes at Lasell College and Quincy College. Huan has also worked on web and user interface projects for the World Trade Center Boston, the Seaport Hotel, La Plaza, Eyes on Education, AT&T, Level 3, and Nike.
data.staff_ed: B.A., Computer Animation, University of Massachusetts Amherst
